entry.title: Goal Setting
entry.summary: This is a test for a first blog for journal
entry.content:
First blog published ever

Well after years and years of not actually using a blog, I have finally did it. Anyway this site will be dedicated to #security e.g. hacking, physical securiy, CTFs and more.

I want to forcus on seperate categories for all of this eventually.

A little about me

I am 0x28 years old, I have been in Information Security over a decade now. I basically taght myself computer security, reverse engineering and so on. I use #blackarch as my security distro because I am an #Archlinux user and have been since it was in beta.

Goal setting is my topic because I want to get better at security. So I decided to quick screwing around and dig down deep into hacking, information security, reverse engineering, and exploit writing. Since I am 0x28 I woulike to think that its never to late to teach an old dog new tricks. I don't like using metasploit for learning and the reason is, is because you really don't learn a thing when you pop! a box and reverse shell using meterpreter. I am here to learn very detail security and OS properties. I started this blog for myself so I could hae a log of everything I am learning. I use JoplinApp for all my notes but I think its time to start a blog so I can actually show it and so I can view it easily online when needed.
